base.description: Used as the text or fill colour for interactive and static primary components such as links, text, and icons

hover.description: Used as the hovered text or fill colour for interactive primary components such as links and text buttons

active.description: Used as the pressed text or fill colour for interactive primary components such as links and text buttons

base.description: Used as the background for primary components such as plain buttons. Paired with text.onBackground for contrast

hover.description: Used as the hovered background for primary components such as plain buttons

active.description: Used as the hovered background for primary components such as plain buttons

muted.description: Used as the subdued background for primary components such as pills. Paired with primary.textBase for a subtler contrast

mutedHover.description: Used as the hovered subdued background for primary components such as pills. Paired with primary.textBase for a subtler contrast

mutedActive.description: Used as the pressed subdued background for primary components such as pills. Paired with primary.textBase for a subtler contrast

box.description: Used as a very light background for primary components such as Message and Box. Used for containers with content blocks

base.description: Used for the border colour for primary components such as buttons and Message

hover.description: Used for the hovered border colour for primary components such as buttons

active.description: Used for the pressed border colour for primary components such as buttons and Message
